member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorDesigner.GetActionReportObject(Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiRequestParams)
member.summary: Get the current report template for the current action of the component. Returns report template from the client for OpenReport action, new report template for CreateReport action, copy of the report template for PreviewReport action. Otherwise returns report template from the cache. The specified request parameters will be used.

member.summary: Get the current report template from the cache. The specified request parameters will be used.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.RequestTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets time which indicates how many seconds the client side will wait for the response from the server side. The default value is 30 seconds.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.CacheTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets time which indicates how many minutes the result of the report rendering will be stored in the server cache or session. The default value is 10 minutes.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.CacheMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode of the report caching.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.CacheItemPriority
member.summary: Specifies the relative priority of report, stored in the system cache.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.AllowAutoUpdateCache
member.summary: Allows the viewer to update the cache automatically. The cache will be updated about once every three minutes if there are no actions in the viewer.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.UseRelativeUrls
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that the viewer will use relative or absolute URLs.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.PortNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which specifies the port number to use in the URL. A value of 0 defines automatic detection. A value of -1 removes the port number.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.PassQueryParametersForResources
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which enables or disables the transfer of URL parameters when requesting the scripts and styles of the viewer.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.PassQueryParametersToReport
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which enables or disables the use of URL parameters as report parameters.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.PassFormValues
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which enables or disables the transfer POST parameters of the form.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.ShowServerErrorPage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which enables or disables the display of the detailed server error in the viewer.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.UseCompression
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which enables or disables the GZip compression for the requests. This allows to reduce the volume of Internet traffic, but slightly slows down the viewer actions.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.UseCacheForResources
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which enables caching for viewer scripts and styles.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.UseLocalizedCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which enables the use of a different cache depending on the selected localization.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.AllowAutoUpdateCookies
member.summary: Allows the viewer to update the cookies automatically on every request to the server. By default, cookies are set when creating the viewer, if they are not specified in the report.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Blazor.StiBlazorViewerOptions.ServerOptions.AllowAntiforgeryToken
member.summary: Allow the viewer to automatically request and send the antiforgery token.
